description:
Looking for some comfortable, classic style made for everyday outfiting? That’s the prAna V-Neck T-Shirt for men. Built with a soft and lightweight jersey fabric that they know you’ll enjoy, you might want to pick up a couple colors, because this shirt makes it totally easy to style your weekly wardrobe.

What makes it different from other shirts? It’s part of thier prAna Basics collection, meaning it’s designed with a blend of organic cotton and recycled polyester, and crafted by our Fair Trade Certified™ Factory Partners. That makes this style 100% Fair Trade Certified™, which is something we can all feel good about.
name: Prana prAna V-Neck SS T-Shirt - Tall - Mens
